cast.overview: Newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane is taken from his mother as a boy and made the ward of a rich industrialist. As a result, every well-meaning, tyrannical or self-destructive move he makes for the rest of his life appears in some way to be a reaction to that deeply wounding event.
cast.title: Citizen Kane

cast.overview: Adventurous filmmaker Carl Denham sets out to produce a motion picture unlike anything the world has seen before. Alongside his leading lady Ann Darrow and his first mate Jack Driscoll, they arrive on an island and discover a legendary creature said to be neither beast nor man. Denham captures the monster to be displayed on Broadway as King Kong, the eighth wonder of the world.
cast.title: King Kong

details.biography: John Northpole was born on December 23, 1892 in Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for One Million B.C. (1940), Dog Justice (1928) and Wharf Angel (1934). He died on February 26, 1964 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
details.name: John Northpole
